entries.message:
Event Type: Priority Network Maintenance

We are performing system changes in the Atlanta location during the following priority maintenance window. 


Start Time: 2021-05-12 07:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2021-05-12 11:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Atlanta instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the priority maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
